### Steps to reproduce the issue

1. Install Intel® Parallel Studio XE 2019 Update 1

```
wget http://registrationcenter-download.intel.com/akdlm/irc_nas/tec/14864/parallel_studio_xe_2019_update1_composer_edition.tgz
tar zxvf parallel_studio_xe_2019_update1_cluster_edition.tgz
./install.sh
[system-specific options]
```
